I am a postdoctoral researcher at the Department of Spatial Economics, part of the VU University in Amsterdam (The Netherlands).

My main research interests are:

  • Urban Economics and Regional Science
  • Spatial Analysis and Spatial Econometrics
  • Open source scientific computing

Feel free to contact me by email.
